body.name: LOVPOI GPS Navigation for Truck Car, 9 inch Trucker GPS for Semi Truck 2024 Map, GPS Truck Drivers Commercial, GPS Navigation System for Trucks, Free Lifetime Map Updates, Spoken Driver Alerts
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 51 mins
features: 【Free Lifetime Map Updates】Preinstalled with the detailed 2024 latest maps of North America with free lifetime updates, include USA Canada Mexico Maps. If you would like to update the latest map(or EU,UK, Ireland, Australia, etc), please contact us ,Get the latest map by connecting LOVPOI GPS Navigator to the Windows pc, or use an external TF Card for map update (if the system is not compatible with Mac ).

【9 inch BIG Screen】LOVPOI Trucker GPS navigation system with 2D / 3D navigation maps, the display was clear and accurate. The professional GPS navigator with bright 9 inch large Touch Screen for truck drivers is easy to use clear and sensitive, resolution 800 x 480.

【Advanced GPS navigator】LOVPOI Truck GPS navigator Customized truck route for the size and weight of your truck, Plus alerts for upcoming bridge heights, weight limits. intelligent voice Alerts for dangerous curves, speed changes, speed cameras, railroad crossings, animal crossings, traffic lights. And support Multiple Vehicle Modes, including Car, Truck (include Truck Commercial/semi Truck), Ambulance, Bus and Taxi.

【BEST NAVIGATION 】You can Choose from a selection of over 40 languages voices that will Spoken turn by turn Directions, so you don’t have to look on the GPS screen all the time. FM Amplify volume function（NO radio）: it can transmit the navigation audio into the audio of car, increase the volume of navigation broadcast to make it clearer. It makes your driving safer, reduce fatigue driving, away from the ticket, Just Enjoy Your Driving.

【LOVPOI SUPPORT】LOVPOI established professional technician team in the United States , supply regular maps upgrades , and provide answers to any questions asked. *Note: after receiving GPS navigation, please use the car charger to fully charge then use. If the satellite signal can not be searched, it may be because of the reason at home, please search the signal in outdoors again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Free Lifetime Map Updates GPS Navigation for Car Truck 9 Inch. Preinstalled with the detailed 2024 latest maps of North America plus free lifetime updates, include USA Canada Mexico Maps. Install and update maps at No Extra Cost. You would update the latest maps (North America, EU,UK, Ireland,Australia and so on). Get the latest map by connecting LOVPOI GPS Navigation to the Windows pc, or use an exteranl TF Card for map update (if the system is not compatible with Mac ).

LOVPOI is the best choice of GPS Navigation for Cars and Trucks. Free Lifetime Maps Update, preloaded with the latest 2024 maps America Canada and Mexico. LOVPOI after-service team in USA, supply all you may request, LOVPOI understand your concern of maps update and lifetime service. The navigation system which has 2D / 3D navigation map display, illustrate clear road map display and enlarged maps of complex intersections, Driver alerts for dangerous curves, speed changes, speed cameras, railroad crossings, animal crossings ,alert you to nearby schools and school zones, Receive notifications for nearby red light cameras and speed cameras. Professional Trucks(semi truck) route has detailed maps for truck trailer drivers That also include truck-related restrictions -like Bridge heights, dangerous curves, weight limits and more and related information for most major roads and highways. And you can save profiles for multiple vehicles or trailers and more. plus LOVPOI GPS Navigation System support postcodes, favourite addresses, point of interest, and satellite coordinates search.

General Information: Brand LOVPOI System Windows CE 6.0 Display Screen 9" TFT LCD touch screen Resolution 800 * 480 pixels Memory 8 GB ROM 256MB RAM (Support TF card up to 32GB) Size(LWH) 22.3×13.7×2.0 cm Net Weight 450g USB Interface USB 2.0, mini USB Battery 3000mAh lithium battery Charging Time 2-3 hours Charging Socket 12V DC socket Car Charger 12-24V/1.5A Package includes 1x 9" Touch Screen GPS Navigation, 1x Suction cup holder, 1x USB cable, 1x Car USB charger, 1x User manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works like a champ. Easy to use. Very user friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Terrible device. It showed where you were but wouldn't allow me to put in a destination. Directions didn't match the device. Waste of money, we got it for a trip, found it didn't work and now the return window just passed so I just wasted my money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have not had a single problem with this. After reading reviews I bought it anyway. One said the screen was too bright. Well if you go to settings that's an easy fix. Good GPS for the money compares nicely to the Rand I had before and that cost over $700.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cumbersome programming for an address but works great - except it’s not very good at sending you over acceptable roads for your specified vehicle. Just be prudent and pay attention to where you are going and you’ll be fine! LOVE the large screen! I did have a problem with the charger since it’s a cigarette lighter plug and some vehicles had a USB connector and no power outlets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was purchased as a gift.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the price and the size of the display. It was purchased as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Hell no sending this back
reviews.reviewText: Received gps looking really good , but wasn’t sure what to expect for this price .I’ve noticed some store that’s no longer in busniss like Walmart that use to be around the corner no longer there but gps show me their location I’ve decided to call and they told me I will need to update and download the new gps software 2024 ? They quote me for an extra $175 ? No refund …if I decide I don’t like it … lol Well im gonna use it and check it to see if its worth if not i will return this asap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sad to say could be better...
reviews.reviewText: Had a working unit for about a year and a half - operative word: HADTop feature: The screen size and amount of information is great! The autosizing feature ranked on your speed is also a great advantage when driving a large vehicle (RV).OK: Since there is no software to feed desired waypoints or destinations (like family members) makes the unit a bit unwieldy. You can handle this issue.Bad: The mount is incredibly fragile - not worth the plastic it's made of. And since the unit itself is large the cantilever effect as you are driving may make it difficult to see detail. Had to prop my unit underneath to steady and support it.Really Bad: My unit simply stopped working after about 18 mos. - no warning, and cannot get it to respond. LOVPOI does not respond to my queries, so I have to question the quality of the unit. Don't know if I am going to replace it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars COMPLETE waste of Money
reviews.reviewText: This is marketed as a "Truck" GPS.- does not show weigh scales- does not show state lines- does not show rest stops- does not show highway mile markers- The screen will not change brightness. It would be nice if the "day screen" could be adjusted brighter.It would be nice if the "night screen" could be much dimmer.- There are very few cities in the memory. If the city you are searching for is not in the system data already, it will not let you program the city. You must program something close, then guess from there.- the highway programming is vastly out of date, example . . . I was getting a 40 mph "speed warning" on I-80 in Wyoming (posted at 80 mph) and I could not turn it off- I attempted to create a route, but the gps refused because I was "overweight". I checked system settings, changed settings to 20 tons, and the system AGAIN refused to program that route (I-80 in Iowa).This might be acceptable for a car, BUT it is marketed as a "Truck GPS"As such, it is worse than useless..I vowed that when I returned home, it was going straight in the garbage.But, instead, I had someone give it to a co-worker (whom I dislike) and got my revenge by watching him fight with this thing . . . . . ..
These are being used when he drives a tour bus to know how to get into cities and ,of course,if the occupants want to go to a mall after a sports game.
Pesimo, no sirvio no duro ni un mes cuando ya no daba las direcciones , no sirve no lo compren!!!
That gps is not for trucks so stop add trucks to it
I can’t get it working it’s hard to download the map it’s laying in the cupboards never used it Never should order it
